blogPost.excerpt: Zen Operating System Imagine if you could design your life. ZenOS is a comprehensive personal life planner that helps you focus and live one day at a time, gaining clarity of your vision.
blogPost.body: Zen Operating System Imagine if you could design your life. ZenOS is a comprehensive personal life planner that helps you focus and live one day at a time, gaining clarity of your vision.
blogPost.title: ZenOS - Design your life with this personal life planner
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 禅宗操作系统 想象一下，如果你可以设计你的生活。ZenOS是一款全面的个人生活规划师，它能帮助你集中精力，一天一个样，获得清晰的愿景。
localize.tagline: 用这个个人生活计划书设计你的生活

localize.description: 禪宗操作系統 想象一下，如果你可以設計你的生活。ZenOS是一款全面的個人生活規劃師，它能幫助你集中精力，一天一個樣，獲得清晰的願景。
localize.tagline: 用這個個人生活計劃書設計你的生活

previous.excerpt: Ever wanted to show an onboarding without code? Show a marketing message on a click of button? Now you got pal.
previous.title: Pal - No-code user onboarding for all your flutter apps

localize.description: 有没有想在没有代码的情况下展示一个入职培训？点击按钮就能显示营销信息？现在你有了朋友。
localize.tagline: 您所有的flutter应用程序的无代码用户上岗。

localize.description: 有沒有想在沒有代碼的情況下展示一個入職培訓？點擊按鈕就能顯示營銷信息？現在你有了朋友。
localize.tagline: 您所有的flutter應用程序的無代碼用戶上崗。

next.excerpt: Meet Doneit, a feature packed daily planner that focuses on simplicity and organization. 🚀 With Doneit, you don't need to worry about your tasks lists ever being messy because this app was designed to help you better organize all of your daily to-do's. 🗂️
next.title: Doneit - Start accomplishing all your tasks quicker

localize.description: Doneit是一款功能丰富的日常计划表，它的重点是简单和组织。🚀 有了Doneit，你不必担心你的任务清单会乱七八糟，因为这个应用程序的设计是为了帮助你更好地组织你所有的日常待办事项。🗂️
localize.tagline: 更快地完成您的所有任务

localize.description: Doneit是一款功能豐富的日常計劃表，它的重點是簡單和組織。🚀 有了Doneit，你不必擔心你的任務清單會亂七八糟，因爲這個應用程序的設計是爲了幫助你更好地組織你所有的日常待辦事項。🗂️
localize.tagline: 更快地完成您的所有任務
